title: COASâ€™s mother passes away
content:
RAWALPINDI, Mar 25 (APP):The mother of Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Syed Asim Munir passed away on the 23rd of Ramzan (March 24). The Inter-Services Public Relations (ISPR) released a statement on Tuesday, announcing her passing and offering prayers for her highest ranks in heaven.
